result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Kenneth Wayne Zdroik in court.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court for Kenneth Wayne Zdroik.  Prosecuting attorney Olivia Simmons in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
Matter set for plea and sentencing.  Atty. Fuentes requests an adjournment.  Case is adjourned to Br. .
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 21, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 10-28-2022, filed.  rmm
Pretrial Services Violation Report 10-25-2022, filed.  rmm

Defendant Kenneth Wayne Zdroik not in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court for Kenneth Wayne Zdroik.  
Prosecuting attorney Katrina Voge in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
OFF THE RECORD.  Status conference held.  Atty. Fuentes requests a plea and sentencing date.Case is adjourned to Br. 1.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court, defendant Kenneth Wayne Zdroik not in court, in custody.  Katrina Voge appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Hearing held via Zoom.  Pretrial conference held.  Atty. Fuentes has received discovery and is waiting on an offer and would like a status date.  Case adjourned to Br. 1.  Status conference scheduled for September 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
No contact order signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Festival Foods.

Defendant Kenneth Wayne Zdroik in court with attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Defendant Kenneth Wayne Zdroik in custody.  Katrina Amy Voge appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Kenneth Wayne Zdroik appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Davila, Branch 1. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Kenneth Wayne Zdroik not in court.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued. Upon arrest, defendant is ordered remanded to a commissioner. Court ordered any bail on deposit to be forfeited. Court makes a finding that there is a possible victim identified and stays the forfeiture order with restitution to be determined at close of case.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 05/11/2022@2:00pm
